column17:
excited positivity about the present.
• Sadness: sorrow or unhappiness.
• Anger: hostility or aggression.
• Fear: anxiety or sense of threat.
• Surprise: unexpectedness or astonishment.
• Disgust: revulsion or moral contempt.
• Trust: confidence or reassurance in someone or something.
• Anticipation: forward-looking excitement or expectation.
• Content: calm
column18:
steady satisfaction without strong excitement.
• Frustration: annoyance or exasperation due to unmet goals.

If the email’s overall tone indicates confidence
column20: choose \u201cContent.\u201d For excitement specifically about future events
column21: choose \u201cAnticipation\u201d rather than \u201cJoy.\u201d Output only the single best-fitting category without additional words or punctuation.\n</TO_OPTIMIZE>"
